data.text:
@_AlienBlackout_ @USPS Yeah I remember at the beginning they had tests that are for the throat. 4 tests.. well I heard that the two per container is for one person. 
So technically only two person tests. What about multiple person family members who live in one house.. 🤔 it's so messed up.

@britneyarmy21 @USPS Didn’t they used to have a saliva test? I know they’re gross but I’m sure you’re not the only one who can’t do the nose! Their whole distribution is crap anyway, four tests per house and that’s it, you get whatever they send you…they’re out of touch.

@_AlienBlackout_ @USPS Damn. Well, I am unable to take the nose swab test because my nose is so dry due to my broken nose and I get bloody noses easily 😕 
They need to send better tests out that works.

@britneyarmy21 @USPS I think that’s mainly crap anyway…if you don’t see a line within five minutes it’s pretty much negative. These say they were manufactured February 13. Three weeks after I ordered them lol.
@_AlienBlackout_ @USPS 20 minutes? Mine are 15 minute rapid tests. Ps. If prone to nose bleeds.. so I can't take them😭
@FitblissP @USPS I was starting to think they were a myth.
@ShawnzeStar @USPS When did you order them? January 20th for me 🤦🏼‍♀️😂
@_AlienBlackout_ @USPS I received mine this week also haha😊
